channel.title: Comments on: iWant
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Echo
item.dc:creator: Echo
item.description:
It looks nice, but I'm going to continue to read reviews. I think Apple builds an incomparable UI, both with hardware and software.
That said, I have a Kindle for the digital paper, and that's going to define an electronic book reader for me in the forseeable future. This seems to vary by individual, but bedtime reading on a backlit screen is a sure trip to insomnia for me. So the iPad and handheld readers are simply not useful to me. That makes the iPad a very large iPhone or a less-functional laptop for me.
